Blitz Vision Limited

The story so far

Blitz Vision Limited

Blitz Vision believes in the power of innovation to transform the way brands connect with audiences. As a cutting-edge digital out-of-home (DOOH) advertising company, they specialize in delivering dynamic, high-impact digital displays that captivate, engage, and drive real results bringing your brandâ€™s message to life, ensuring it reaches the right audience at the right time

Visit Website

Thought Process

The Challenge

Establishing a Strong Digital Foundation for a Startup As a new entrant in the Digital Out-Of-Home (DOOH) advertising industry, Blitz Vision faced the challenge of building a compelling online presence from the ground up. Without a website or a social media strategy, the startup struggled to showcase its services, attract potential clients, and position itself competitively in the market

The Solution

JemsaMediaTech Digital stepped in to revamp Moonlight Traders Limited' s digital presence by implementing a tailored Social Media Marketing (SMM) solution. Our approach was designed to address their challenges and position the company as a trusted and recognizable brand in the vehicle spare parts industry.

The Results

Increased Brand Recognition

Instagram and Facebook followers increased by 20% and 30% in 3 months respectively.

Improved Social Media Engagement

Content shared boosted interaction; indicated by an increase in likes, comments, shares, and follows.

Growth in Online Reviews and Ratings

Increase in positive reviews from satisfied patients, who chose #DensmileDentalClinic

Growth in Online Reviews and Ratings
